description: My one bedroom apartment is within walking distance of Williamsburg and close to local restaurants such as Anella, Achilles Heel, Bakeri, and Troost. Easy transportation is also close; the apartment is two blocks from the Greenpoint G train, East River ferry, and several bus lines. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). Please enjoy the library and fully equipped kitchen, with a view of the Empire State building from the window.
name: Greenpoint One Bedroom
review: Erin's place is great! Very cozy and accessible. She was extremely accommodating with my unique check in situation. Thanks Erin!
